description: These facemarks all have words with them to help communicate their friendship. Communication is key in any relationship, and here we see some emotes giving thanks to one another and wishing one another good night. Replace these words with any other expression. Head over to the word emoticon category to see what other options you have!  (人-ω-)｡o.ﾟ｡*･★Good Night★･*｡ﾟo｡(-ω-人) (人*´∪`)♪тнайк　чоц♪(´∪`*人) (人❛ᴗ❛)♪тнайк　чоц♪(❛ᴗ❛*人)
title: Words
